text:
Quick poll - trying to get a sense of JS framework experience in our community.

:reactjs:  I feel comfortable building with ReactJS
:vuejs:  I feel comfortable building with VueJS
:svelte:  I feel comfortable building with Svelte
:javascript:  I feel comfortable building with vanilla JavaScript
:shrug::skin-tone-2:  I feel comfortable building with a JS framework that is not listed. (please comment stating which)

Please respond with the relevant Emoji. Itâ€™s okay to pick more than one.
